queue.title: Add timing telemetry to service-liveness.mjs
queue.description: Mirror wq-676 pattern: log wall-clock timing for service-liveness.mjs probes to a separate timing file. Currently only engagement-liveness has timing. Service-liveness runs from cron-platform-probe.sh and during B session hooks — timing data would show if batched service probes are within budget.

queue.title: Liveness timing histogram endpoint
queue.description: Add GET /api/liveness-timing to api.mjs that returns aggregated timing stats from liveness-timing.json — avg/p95/trend over last 10/50/100 probes. Makes telemetry queryable by external consumers without reading files.

queue.title: Publish first knowbster collection bundle
queue.description: Use knowbster-collection.mjs --publish to create and publish the agent-architecture collection. Pre-requisite for wq-675 cron to produce actual data. Check that collection templates have enough verified patterns.

queue.title: Platform health API for external agent consumption (d069)
queue.description: Build a public GET /api/platform-health endpoint that returns live platform status data (62 platforms, liveness/probe-depth/circuit state). Include CORS headers and SKILL.md documentation so other agents can discover and consume it. Announce on engagement platforms. Track consumption via request logging. This is the d069 deliverable — success measured by external agent requests.

queue.title: Intel-to-build yield tracker
queue.description: Track what % of intel-auto queue items produce actual build work vs get closed as non-actionable. Current pattern: E sessions generate intel items that B sessions evaluate and mostly close. If yield is consistently <20%, the auto-seeding heuristic needs tuning. Add tracking to work-queue-archive.json analysis and surface in audit-stats.mjs.

queue.title: Fix brainstorming auto-retire gap for stale items
queue.description: Memory Paper contribution idea (added ~s1541) is 39 sessions old but wasn't auto-retired despite 30-session threshold. Investigate why the auto-retire mechanism in A session pre-hook (35-maintain-audit.sh or equivalent) didn't catch it. Clean up the stale item and verify the mechanism works for future items.

outcome.note: Root cause: MODE vs MODE_CHAR env var mismatch. Phase 2 never ran in A sessions. Also fixed Phase 1 sed pattern (never matched trailing content) and grep count double-output. 37 stale struck-through entries cleaned up.

queue.title: Audit all hooks for MODE vs MODE_CHAR env var usage
queue.description: wq-683 found that 44-brainstorm-cleanup.sh used ${MODE:-B} instead of ${MODE_CHAR:-B}. While hooks with _A/_B/_E/_R suffixes are filtered by run-hooks.sh, unsuffixed hooks that internally check session mode may have the same bug. Grep all hooks for MODE references and verify they use MODE_CHAR consistently. Found during wq-683: 08-cost-forecast-gate.sh does it correctly (MODE="${MODE_CHAR:-B}"), 39-compliance-nudge.sh also correct. But there may be others.

outcome.note: Fixed 6 hooks using wrong env vars (SESSION_TYPE, SESSION_MODE, MODE) instead of MODE_CHAR. Impact: 09-financial-check (never ran in B), 28-diversity-history (never ran in E), 23-outcome-feedback (always reported type B). Others were redundant guards on suffixed hooks.
